languages.text: "Подведем итог. Тебя ранили, и найти корабль святой Ардженты, как я понимаю, не удалось?"
"So, just to clarify, you were wounded, so you never found Saint Argenta's ship, is that right?"
languages.original_text: "Подведем итог. Тебя ранили, и найти корабль святой Ардженты, как я понимаю, не удалось?"

traits.locale_text: "Let's summarize. You were wounded, so I take it you never found Saint Argenta's ship, right?"
"Let's summarize. You were wounded, so I take it you never found Saint Argenta's ship, right?"
"So, just to clarify, you were wounded, so you never found Saint Argenta's ship, is that right?"
"So, just to clarify, you were wounded, so you never found Saint Argenta's ship, is that right?"
"So, just to clarify, you were wounded, so you never found Saint Argenta's ship, is that right?"

languages.text: “可以这么说，你是因为受了伤，所以才没有找到阿洁塔的飞船。是这样吧？”
languages.original_text: "So, just to clarify, you were wounded, so you never found Saint Argenta's ship, is that right?"

traits.locale_text: “可以这么说，你是因为受了伤，所以才没有找到阿洁塔的飞船。是这样吧？”

languages.text: «Para aclarar las cosas, resultó herida y por eso no llegó a encontrar la nave de santa Argenta, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: "So, just to clarify, you were wounded, so you never found Saint Argenta's ship, is that right?"

traits.locale_text: «Para aclarar las cosas, resultó herida y por eso no llegó a encontrar la nave de santa Argenta, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: 「はっきりさせておきたいのだが、お前は負傷していたために、聖アルジェンタの船は見つけられなかったのだな？」
languages.original_text: "So, just to clarify, you were wounded, so you never found Saint Argenta's ship, is that right?"

traits.locale_text: 「はっきりさせておきたいのだが、お前は負傷していたために、聖アルジェンタの船は見つけられなかったのだな？」

languages.text: "Nur zur Sicherheit, Ihr wurdet also verwundet und habt das Schiff der Heiligen Argenta nie gefunden, ist das richtig?"
languages.original_text: "So, just to clarify, you were wounded, so you never found Saint Argenta's ship, is that right?"

traits.locale_text: "Nur zur Sicherheit, Ihr wurdet also verwundet und habt das Schiff der Heiligen Argenta nie gefunden, ist das richtig?"

languages.text: « Donc si je comprends bien, vous avez été blessée et n'avez pas trouvé le vaisseau de Sainte Argenta ? »
languages.original_text: "So, just to clarify, you were wounded, so you never found Saint Argenta's ship, is that right?"

traits.locale_text: « Donc si je comprends bien, vous avez été blessée et n'avez pas trouvé le vaisseau de Sainte Argenta ? »

languages.text: "Doğru anladığımdan emin olmak adına soruyorum: Yaralanmıştın... Bu yüzden Azize Argenta'nın gemisini bulamadın, yanlış mıyım?"
languages.original_text: "So, just to clarify, you were wounded, so you never found Saint Argenta's ship, is that right?"

traits.locale_text: "Doğru anladığımdan emin olmak adına soruyorum: Yaralanmıştın… Bu yüzden Azize Argenta'nın gemisini bulamadın, yanlış mıyım?"
